<MethodEndpoint

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method is used to insert a new entry of PFM Card Transaction.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"","required":["clientRequestId","merchantName","cashDirection"],"type":"object","properties":{"clientRequestId":{"description":"The unique Id to identify the request and uses as idempotence.","type":"string"},"mcc":{"description":"4-digit code to classify the business by the type of goods or services provided.","pattern":"^\\d{4}$","type":"string"},"merchantName":{"description":"Name of the establishment where the purchase/transaction was made.","type":"string"},"merchantIdCode":{"description":"Establishment identifier.","type":"string"},"cashDirection":{"description":"The Transaction Flow.","enum":["CashIn","CashOut"],"type":"string"},"tags":{"description":"List of tags","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"example":{"clientRequestId":"string","mcc":"3005","merchantIdCode":"string","merchantName":"string","isExpense":true},"title":"PfmCardRequest"},"examples":{"pfmCardRequest":{"value":{"clientRequestId":"7eb05d35-ce4e-4fed-b2ad-6a9a6f208816","mcc":"5084","merchantName":"Mayer LLC","merchantIdCode":"d58cea15-a31a-4df0-8727-2099806198e7","cashDirection":"CashOut"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
